content: I have discussed this at length with <@!425572898787426305> .. If my memory serves, the difficult adjusts quite rapidly if a decrease is hashrate is seen. I do agree that we should be mindful here.. Though, pretty sure we beat the hell out of this one. The answer came down to a legacy EIP that addresses this.

author: sumsof
content: I understand the basic adjustment mechanism, however the blocktime will still be dependent on total hashrate after the bomb starts being significant since it adds a constant *amount* of difficulty not a fixed percent. If you play with the Python code included in the EIP you can see how this works in equilibrium.
